name: Pixelstein 3d
description:
Alwys loved the old fps games like wolfenstein and blakestone etc.

So i sat down one day and started to write my own Engine with modern tools to look like a old raycaster Engine.  (  Everything is coded in agk basic programming language and is something similar to Stos and Amos. )

Why not unity do you say?

Agk is fast with one button deployement to windows,linux,html5,ios and Android.

And its dead cheap with no extra payments to later release you games on all platforms. 

You code once in language you like basic,java,c++,Sharp and delphi etc...

Then does agk with a button press do all to work to share your games on the hardware and os variations. ( Basic language have this option )

Had high hopes that people would love it but ended up to be downloaed poorly so its still in development but iam doing smaller updates when i have the time to do so.

I am writing apps to be funded with ingame ads because i want to share for free but buy media like sfx and Music for my Projects with money from my own pocket.

The Project is from earlier this year and i am looking at options to make it more popular this fall and update it.

The goal for my apps is to earn enough to fund my Projects when i invest alot of Money in Tools and media.

Hope you like this fully working beta for free and let me know if its something you want me to keep working on.

I put alot of love and hardwork in to this mobile app ………..

Cheers 

Cliff M ( play8bitars
